title: Mrs. Fletcher Trailer: Kathryn Hahn, If You’re Nasty
text:
If Kathryn Hahn wants to jerk herself off in the comfort of her own kitchen just because she feels like it, yes, we will be cheering her on! (Oven mitts very optional.) Such kinky fun is front and center in the official trailer for HBO’s Mrs. Fletcher, which follows Hahn’s “empty-nest divorcée” as she “reinvents her life to find the happiness and sexual fulfillment that’s eluded her in the past.” This fumbled awakening begins thanks to her son moving out of the house for college ⁠— and they both soon begin to dabble in internet porn, dating apps, and casual hookups like there’s no tomorrow, to varied results. The series will debut on HBO later this year, you horny viewers.

Related
description: Kathryn Hahn stars in the trailer for HBO’s newest comedy Mrs. Fletcher, about a woman who has a sexual awakening later in life.
